statements: SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT image_id, scan_date, analyzed_by FROM TumorImages ORDER BY scan_date DESC
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE analyzed_by IS NULL
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS image_count FROM TumorImages GROUP BY patient_id
SELECT image_id, scan_date FROM TumorImages WHERE scan_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT image_id, patient_id, scan_date FROM TumorImages WHERE analyzed_by = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM TumorImages WHERE patient_id = '8bfe43d5-20e6-4f64-b1be-ef4989286ccb' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT image_id, analyzed_by FROM TumorImages WHERE analyzed_by IS NOT NULL AND scan_date >= '2021-01-01' AND scan_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY analyzed_by ASC, scan_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM TumorImages WHERE analyzed_by LIKE '%Dr.%' AND scan_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT image_data FROM TumorImages WHERE analyzed_by = 'Dr. Jones' AND patient_id IN ('8bfe43d5-20e6-4f64-b1be-ef4989286ccb', 'f8c37603-3660-4a45-ad44-3f9b570fbf21') GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE diagnosis='Benign';
SELECT tumor_id, diagnosis FROM tumors WHERE patient_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT diagnosis, analysis_results FROM tumors ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT tumor_id, patient_id FROM tumors WHERE diagnosis='Malignant' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM tumors INNER JOIN specialists ON tumors.diagnosis = specialists.area_of_expertise;
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE patient_id = 'abc-123'
SELECT diagnosis, analysis_results FROM tumors WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer'
SELECT image FROM tumors ORDER BY tumor_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM tumors
SELECT specialist_id, name FROM specialists
SELECT * FROM tumors WHERE tumor_type = 'Malignant';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty FROM oncologists WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT tumor_type, tumor_size FROM tumors WHERE biopsy_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE last_visit_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM tumors
SELECT tumor_id, tumor_type, biopsy_date FROM tumors WHERE tumor_size > 5
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, last_visit_date FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT oncologist_name, specialty FROM oncologists WHERE years_of_experience > 10
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Lung Cancer';
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT specialist_name, specialization FROM Specialists ORDER BY specialist_name;
SELECT * FROM TumorScans LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE birth_date >= '1980-01-01'
SELECT scan_id, scan_data FROM TumorScans WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT specialist_id, specialist_name FROM Specialists WHERE specialization = 'Oncology'
SELECT * FROM TumorImages ORDER BY scan_date DESC
SELECT * FROM image;
SELECT id, image_data FROM image ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT scan_date, scan_details FROM scan WHERE patient_id = '12345' ORDER BY scan_date ASC;
SELECT id, tumor_size, tumor_location FROM tumor WHERE tumor_location LIKE '%brain%';
SELECT a.analysis_result, s.name FROM analysis a JOIN specialist s ON a.specialist_id = s.id ORDER BY s.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM image WHERE patient_id = 'f3f11724-4a03-4268-9866-1e7ebbc4f7c5';
SELECT scan_date, scan_details FROM scan WHERE scan_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, specialization FROM specialist WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT tumor_size, tumor_location FROM tumor ORDER BY tumor_size DESC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM analysis JOIN specialist ON analysis.specialist_id = specialist.id WHERE specialist.specialization = 'Oncology';
